professional_summary: Oracle Database Administrator with over seven years of experience in database design, monitoring, performance tuning, and security implementations. Possess strong analytical, verbal, written, and organizational abilities; experienced in managing large-scale databases, optimizing system performance, and implementing robust security measures. Proactive learner with a focus on staying updated on emerging technologies and best practices in database management.

key_responsibilities: Constructing and implementing database security policies using passwords
privileges
and user profiles.
Designing and optimizing backup strategies for physical and logical backups using RMAN and Datapump utilities; reducing backup times with Block Change Tracking (BCT).
Resolving database space issues through optimization techniques.
Upgrading and migrating databases from 11g to 12c
ensuring seamless transitions and minimal downtime.
Monitoring database performance using AWR
ADDM
ASH
and other tools for proactive troubleshooting and performance tuning.
Implementing database partitioning
archiving
and cloning strategies to enhance efficiency and scalability.
Applying routine patches and updates while minimizing impact on production systems.
Utilizing Oracle Enterprise Manager (OEM) for centralized monitoring and management of database environments.
Performing capacity planning to ensure infrastructure scalability based on workload demands.
Improving user satisfaction by reducing downtime through efficient problem resolution and proactive maintenance.
Installing and configuring Oracle databases on both Windows and Linux platforms using the Oracle Configuration Architecture (OCA).
Using DataPump and RMAN utilities for database refreshes
backups
and migrations.
Implementing security policies including Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)
triple-A authentication (AAA)
and auditing policies to protect sensitive data.
Managing roles
privileges
and user access based on activity and audit requirements.
Supporting a 24x7 remote environment with on-call rotation to address critical issues promptly.
Contributing to the development of ETL processes using Informatica and other tools for data extraction and transformation.
Assisting in database migrations from 10g to 11g using DataPump and DBUA utilities.
Performing database refreshes and copies using Data Pump IMP/EXP and RMAN duplicate technology.
Installing and administering Oracle and SQL Server software on Windows and Linux platforms
adhering to the Oracle File Architecture (OFA).
Developing and implementing backup strategies that meet company Service Level Agreements (SLAs); optimizing backups with Block Change Tracking (BCT) to reduce time.
Deploying security policies including Transparent Data Encryption (TDE)
triple-A authentication (AAA)
and auditing policies; managing roles
privileges
and user access.
Contributing to the resolution of complex performance issues through tuning and optimization techniques.
